meanings.definition: To eat something, especially with a crunching sound.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit munches on carrots in the garden.
meanings.sent2: She munches on popcorn while watching a movie.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel munches happily on the nuts it found.
meanings.sent4: The waves munch on the sandy shore, slowly eroding it away.
meanings.sent5: The old man munches slowly, savoring each bite of his sandwich.

meanings.sent1: She packed a healthy munch for her hike.
meanings.sent2: The kids enjoyed a variety of munches at the party.
meanings.sent3: The office always has a bowl of munches for everyone to share.
meanings.sent4: The munches at the picnic were a hit with all the guests.
meanings.sent5: He always keeps a stash of munches in his desk for a quick bite.
